name: EggIsland
description:
this game made for godot wild jam and untitled game jam

it is a simple platform game  with a simple gameplay . 

assets i use it:

https://analogstudios.itch.io/

https://joshuuu.itch.io/

movement:

A or left arrow: move left

D or right arrow: move right

Space: jump

you can also double jump and climb on the wall

have fun
